item.title: Monitor your homelab and get notified by Telegram!
item.description: This is a detailed guide on setting up Uptime Kuma using Docker and configuring a Telegram bot to receive notifications when monitored URLs go down or have issues. Setup time: 15 minutes (assuming prerequisites are met) Uptime Kuma is an open-source monitoring tool for tracking uptime and receiving notifications when websites, APIs, or other services go offline. Paired with a Telegram bot, you can receive instant notifications on your phone or desktop.
